name: HypeRange - Aim with your Heart Rate
name_original: HypeRange - Aim with your Heart Rate
description:
What if there was a new way to interact with games? 

One that could involve your emotions and your real-time heart rate and take your game experience to an even higher level?

Enter Biometrics!

You've played all the shooters, but you never played your heart! ;-) 

HypeRange allows you to combine your aiming skills with your real-time-heartrate and alters your aim when your heart rate is too high. 

How? 

HypeRate.io - streamers first choice heart rate widget and free Unity Plugin allowed us to create a fun shooter that demos the capabilities of future games. 

Become #1 on the leaderboard by consciously lowering your heart rate by breathing exercises as part of the game. If you're too excited, the sergeant won't be pleased, and YOU won't be able to aim!

So take a deep breath and get your skills tested at the HypeRange!

How to Play with Apple Watch or Android Watch:

1. Install our free App for, Apple Watch or Android Watch  (see all supported Devices here)
2. Start a Session
3. Enter your Session ID 

If you don't have a Smart Watch then we've got you covered! 

How to Play with WebBluetooth:

1. Put on your Chestbelt or Wristband (see all supported Devices here)
2. Open Chrome Browser (use our WebBluetooth support)
3. Activate Bluetooth
4. Connect
5. Enter your Session ID 

That’s it — done in less than 20 seconds!

Check out this video to see the installation in real-time:

Tips'n Tricks

The Valsalva Maneuver

Breathe in for 5-8 seconds, hold that breath for 3-5 seconds, then exhale slowly.
Do this several times to raise your aortic pressure, which will lower your heart rate.

Built your own Biometric Game

If you want to built your own Game based on the Users Heart rate, just download oor free Unity Plugin.
we can't wait to see your ideas!

Check out our Twitter, YouTube, and Discord to also make feature requests, or just have a chat with us :)
